# ggbash

ggbash provides a bash-like REPL environment for ggplot2.

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(ggbash)

ggbash() # enter into ggbash session
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
user@host currentDir $ use iris
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
Observations: 150
Variables: 5
$ Sepal.Length (dbl) 5.1, 4.9, 4.7, 4.6, 5.0, 5.4, 4.6, 5.0, 4.4, 4.9, 5.4, 4.8, ...

```
